AzureBareMetalStorageInstanceIdentity.description: Identity for Azure Bare Metal Storage Instance.

principalId.description: The principal ID of Azure Bare Metal Storage Instance identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID associated with the Azure Bare Metal Storage Instance. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

type.description: The type of identity used for the Azure Bare Metal Storage Instance. The type 'SystemAssigned' refers to an implicitly created identity. The type 'None' will remove any identities from the Azure Bare Metal Storage Instance.

Disk.description: Specifies the disk information fo the Azure Bare Metal Instance

diskSizeGB.description: Specifies the size of an empty data disk in gigabytes.

lun.description: Specifies the logical unit number of the data disk. This value is used to identify data disks within the VM and therefore must be unique for each data disk attached to a VM.

ForceState.description: The active state empowers the server with the ability to forcefully terminate and halt any existing processes that may be running on the server

forceState.description: Whether to force restart by shutting all processes.

HardwareProfile.description: Specifies the hardware settings for the Azure Bare Metal Instance.

hardwareType.description: Name of the hardware type (vendor and/or their product name)

azureBareMetalInstanceSize.description: Specifies the Azure Bare Metal Instance SKU.

NetworkInterface.description: Specifies the network interfaces of a bare metal resource.

ipAddress.description: Specifies the IP address of the network interface.

NetworkProfile.description: Specifies the network settings for the Azure Bare Metal Instance disks.

networkInterfaces.description: Specifies the network interfaces for the Azure Bare Metal Instance.

circuitId.description: Specifies the circuit id for connecting to express route.

OSProfile.description: Specifies the operating system settings for the Azure Bare Metal instance.

computerName.description: Specifies the host OS name of the Azure Bare Metal instance.

osType.description: This property allows you to specify the type of the OS.

sshPublicKey.description: Specifies the SSH public key used to access the operating system.

OperationStatus.description: The OperationStatus object returns the state of an asynchronous operation.

startTime.description: Start Time when the operation was initially executed.

error.description: An error from the Azure Bare Metal Infrastructure service.

OperationStatusError.description: An error from the Azure Bare Metal Infrastructure service.

ResourceIdentityType.description: The type of identity used for the Azure Bare Metal Storage Instance. The type 'SystemAssigned' refers to an implicitly created identity. The type 'None' will remove any identities from the Azure Bare Metal Storage Instance.

osDisks.description: Specifies information about the operating system disk used by bare metal instance.
